User Tip (the4sakenmafia) for ZeroMe!

  - A way to search user's.
  - An option that shows the list of site administrators, as a reference point for which it was possible to send a message to take questions or see what published.
  - Have a personal list followed and keep this chat list for private messages to users that I want to add in the conversation, messenger type (which would be the true great use of the site).
  - It is possible to find here in zero net many chat's but none of that to exchange private messages sharing documents.
  - See what has been published in general by the user that we search.

Anyway, something more gender facebook, here you have many websites but nothing really very general, how to get doubts about various OS, software, hardware, networking, hacking, Metasploit, etc.
In this network, the zeroMe approaches to facebook, I'm sure it would be a good way to personal strides for knowledge sharing.
